Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.evalform

Class Question

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.evalform.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Question extends Object implements Serializable
Contains all data, methods, and formatting information of a Question within an Evaluation. Can be serialized for storage in a database.
Author:
Logan Racer

    • getQuestionMaxPointsNaSensitive

      public int getQuestionMaxPointsNaSensitive()
      Checks for the max earnable points possible for 'DROPDOWN' type questions. Non-dropdown questions will return 0. Questions where the response is 'N/A' will also return 0.
      Returns:
      maxPoints - The max score possible for a question.

    • getQuestionMaxPoints

      public int getQuestionMaxPoints()
      Checks for the max earnable points possible for 'DROPDOWN' type questions. Non-dropdown questions will return 0. This method will return the true max points of a question, regardless of 'N/A' responses.
      Returns:
      maxPoints - The max score possible for a question.

    • getQuestionEarnedPoints

      public int getQuestionEarnedPoints()
      Checks for the earned points for 'DROPDOWN' type questions. Non-dropdown questions will return 0. 'N/A' responses will return 0.
      Returns:
      earnedPoints - Value of the points earned in the Question response

    • computeResultString

      public String computeResultString(double score)
      Returns the appropriate string associated with the score provided. Intended to be used for 'COMPUTE' questions to display the proper grading text. Grading scale and text is provided by the List of ComputeRanges.
      Parameters:
      score -
      Returns:
      resultString - Written grade earned from the provided score

    • processQuestionToolTip

      public List<String> processQuestionToolTip(String secName)
      Updates appropriate strings in the Question object with HTML formatting information for displaying tooltips on the Evaluation.
      Parameters:
      secName - - Name of the parent section of the Question. Used for generating accurate warning messages.
      Returns:
      warnings - List of Warnings encountered while processing the tooltips.
